description:
Misumaru Middle School`s passionate Student Vice President. He has a black belt in martial arts and a lightning-quick temper to match, but he`s also very loyal and will stand by his friends no matter what. There appears to be some kind of connection between Kyouichi and http://anidb.net/ch39368 [Harumi]; but at the moment, neither of them seems willing - or able - to acknowledge it. Despite all his harsh words, Kyouichi actually does have a soft side, and is hard not to like.
Source: shingu.rightstuf.com
name: Moriguchi Kyouichi
